creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: bottle with square base and narrow, square mouth; delicate designs of chrysanthemums and cherry blossoms on alternating faces; red, green, blue coloring on white
markings: CR Fenton and Co. Ltd. sticker on underside; round sticker on underside: [32 / 17/2/76]; marks on bottom, in black: [N=43]
medium: Hizen ware; Kakiemon style; porcelain with overglaze enamels
title: Bottle with Chrysanthemums and plums
